summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2578, for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northwest, from West 67th Street to West 70th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 30057 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
